definition: Red Fort (historic building in Delhi, India)
an earthwork/castle/position of defense/stronghold/used in place names, often as phonetic bao for "burg" or "bad"
variant of 鋪|铺[pu4]/used in place names

sentences.english: Modis strong push from Red fort will only catalyse the possibility to reality.
sentences.chinese: 莫迪在紅堡發表的演說將促成其成爲現實。

sentences.english: Worse, a hundred times worse, she had lost sight of the Red Keep.
sentences.chinese: 真糟糕，糟糕百倍的是，她看不見紅堡了。

sentences.english: Once she reached its gates, the worst of her travails would be over.
sentences.chinese: 一旦她到達紅堡大門，最難熬的一部分就結束了。
